start_text:
👋 Hello! I'm a bot for finding a team and clubs in Brawl Stars.
Click on "Start" to get acquainted with all my features. 🔮
subscription_required: Subscribe to Bubser Brawl Stars channel and click start
error_checking_subscription: ❌ Error while checking subscription. Please try again later.
search_team_menu_text: 📋 Choose one of the buttons for the team:
search_club_menu_text: 📋 Choose one of the buttons for the club:
normal_search_advice_text:
💡 Tip:
If you notice an announcement with violations, click on "⚠️ Report". Thank you!
no_announcements: 📝 No announcements sent. Send a photo to create:
report_text: ⬆️ What violation is in this announcement?
premium_text:
😎 Be the best with a Premium subscription and its cool features!

⭐️ Early access to new features - test new functions first.

📲 Video and GIF in announcements - attract more teammates!

🔥 Two active announcements - search for two teams or two clubs at the same time.

🏆 Premium mark - stand out among other players.
premium_prices_text:
💰 Choose Premium subscription term:

1️⃣ Month: {month} rub.
2️⃣ Half-year: {half_year} rub.
3️⃣ Year: {year} rub.
4️⃣ Forever: {forever} rub.
premium_active_until: 📅 Your Premium subscription is active until: {date}
premium_active_forever: 🔄 Your Premium subscription is active forever!
admin_price_menu:
💸 Premium price management:

Current prices:
1️⃣ Month: {month} rub.
2️⃣ Half-year: {half_year} rub.
3️⃣ Year: {year} rub.
4️⃣ Forever: {forever} rub.
error_invalid_recipient: ❌ Invalid ID. Enter numeric recipient ID.
error_invalid_amount: ❌ Enter numeric value for coins amount.
error_insufficient_crystals: ❌ Error: you don't have enough coins. Your balance: {crystals}.
transfer_success: ✅ Coins sent successfully: {amount} coins to recipient {recipient}.
no_announcement_create_prompt: 📄 You don't have an announcement yet. Send a photo to create a new announcement.
ann_send_photo:
📲 Send a photo, video or GIF to create an announcement
(Video and GIF only for premium users):
ann_media_invalid: ❌ Please send a photo, or video/GIF (if you have premium).
ann_desc_short: 😉 Description must be at least 20 characters
ann_preview: 🔍 Here is how your announcement will look:
ann_created_success: ✅ Your announcement has been created and is open for search!
gift_text:
🎁 Receive a gift every day at 00:00!

⚠️ To receive a gift, you need to subscribe to all sponsors or have premium status.
gift_time_error: ⏰ You have already received a gift today. Come back tomorrow!
gift_sponsors_required: ⚠️ To receive a gift, you need to subscribe to all sponsors or have premium status.
gift_subscribe_to_sponsors: ⚠️ Subscribe to all sponsors to receive a daily gift!
ann_select_keyword: 🔑 Choose a keyword for your announcement:
not_your_announcement: ❌ This is not your announcement or it doesn't exist
daily_crystals_received:
✅ You received {amount} coins!
Come back tomorrow for a new reward!
daily_crystals_already:
⏳ You have already received today's coins.
Come back tomorrow!
rules_text:
Advertising ❌

External links ❌

Bad language ❌

Content 18+ ❌

⚠️ Click «Report» if someone's announcement violates our rules
sponsors_description:
Subscribe to our sponsors to receive a daily gift! 🎁
Premium users can receive gifts without subscribing!
sponsors_premium_description:
🌟 You have premium status!
You don't need to subscribe to sponsors to receive gifts.
no_sponsors: 🤷‍♂️ There are no sponsors available at the moment.
check_subscription_text:
📲 To be able to receive a daily gift, subscribe to the sponsor channel: {name}

After subscribing, click the 'Confirm subscription' button.
subscription_success: ✅ You have successfully subscribed to the sponsor: {name}!
subscription_error: ❌ An error occurred while checking your subscription. Please try again later.
sponsor_not_subscribed: ❌ You are not subscribed to the sponsor's channel. Please subscribe and try again.
admin_add_sponsor_channel_id: Enter channel ID for subscription verification (skip by sending '-'):
admin_add_sponsor_reward: Enter reward in coins for subscription (number only):
already_subscribed: ✅ You're already subscribed to this sponsor!
admin_confirm_delete_sponsor: ❓ Are you sure you want to delete this sponsor?
premium_announcement_limit: 🔥 With premium status you can create up to 2 announcements of each type (team/club).
no_premium_announcement_limit: ⚠️ Without premium status you can create only one announcement.
premium_announcement_limit_reached: ❌ You already have the maximum number of announcements of this type (2). Delete one of the existing announcements to create a new one.
no_premium_announcement_limit_reached: ❌ You already have an announcement. To create multiple announcements, get premium status.
promo_already_used: ❌ You have already used this promo code.
promo_limit_reached: ❌ Usage limit for this promo code has been reached.
promo_error: ❌ An error occurred while activating the promo code.
premium_status_active: 💎 You have an active premium status!
admin_enter_promo_code: Enter promo code text (only letters and numbers):
admin_invalid_promo_code: ❌ Promo code must contain only letters and numbers. Please try again:
admin_enter_promo_duration: Select premium duration for this promo code:
admin_enter_custom_duration: Enter promo code duration in days (number only):
admin_invalid_duration: ❌ Duration must be a positive number. Please try again:
admin_enter_promo_uses: Select maximum number of uses for this promo code:
admin_enter_custom_uses: Enter maximum number of uses for this promo code (number only):
admin_invalid_uses: ❌ Number of uses must be a positive number. Please try again:
admin_enter_promo_expiry: Select the expiry date for this promo code (after how many days it will become invalid):
admin_promo_error: ❌ Error creating promo code. This code may already exist.
premium_active_text:
😎 Be the best with a Premium subscription and its cool features!

⭐️ Early access to new features - test new functions first.

📲 Video and GIF in announcements - attract more teammates!

🔥 Two active announcements - search for two teams or two clubs at the same time.

🏆 Premium mark - stand out among other players.

✅ Your premium subscription is active until: {date}
promo_code_success:
✅ Promo code successfully activated! Premium status activated for {days} days.
Expiration date: {date}
promo_code_used: ❌ You have already used this promo code.
promo_code_limit: ❌ Usage limit for this promo code has been reached.
promo_code_error: ❌ An error occurred while activating the promo code.
achievement_secret_description: Complete special actions to unlock this achievement
achievement_unlocked: 🎉 Congratulations! You've unlocked a new achievement: {name}
achievement_reward_received: 💰 You received {reward} coins as a reward!
buy_achievement_confirm: Are you sure you want to buy the achievement "{name}" for {price} coins?
buy_achievement_not_enough_coins: ❌ Not enough coins. You have {balance}, but need {price}
buy_secret_confirm: Are you sure you want to buy the secret content "{name}" for {price} coins?
buy_secret_success: ✅ You successfully purchased the secret content: {name}
buy_secret_not_enough_coins: ❌ Not enough coins. You have {balance}, but need {price}
buy_secret_already_owned: ❌ You already own this secret content
achievement_visit_sections_desc: Visit all sections of the bot
achievement_referrals_desc: Invite {count} friends using your referral link
no_announcements_with_keyword: 📝 No announcements with the selected keyword found
shop_text:
🛍️ Shop

You can buy with coins:

💫 Premium forever: 100,000 coins
🏆 Achievement "Rich": 10,000 coins
💫 Premium for a week: 1,000 coins
💫 Premium for a day: 400 coins
🎬 Secret Bubs video: 2,000 coins
not_enough_coins: ❌ Not enough coins. You have {balance}, required {price}
admin_invalid_amount: ❌ Invalid amount of coins. Enter a positive number.
